title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“A crowd of only 22,449, including 7,613 no-shows, watched as the Cardinals broke a three-game losing streak.” [Newsday, 9 November 1987. Submitted by Benjamin M. Steiner, Flushing, New York.]
